LanguageData.ToolkitResearch.Messages.VoteMessage: Vote on the next research project:
LanguageData.ToolkitResearch.Messages.InvalidMaximumO: Research polls may only have between 2 to 20 choices. A value outside this range will not be saved.
LanguageData.ToolkitResearch.Messages.InvalidDuration: Research polls may only run anywhere between 60 seconds to 600 seconds, or between 1-10 minutes. A value outside this range will not be saved.
LanguageData.ToolkitResearch.Messages.InvalidResultsD: The results page of a research poll may only run anywhere between 0 to 600 seconds, or 0-10 minutes. A value outside this range will not be saved.
LanguageData.ToolkitResearch.Messages.InvalidComplete: The "research completed" page of a research poll may only run anywhere between 0 and 600 seconds, or 0-10 minutes. A value outside this range will not be saved.
LanguageData.ToolkitResearch.Messages.ToolkitPolls: This setting doesn't affect research polls while ToolkitPolls is enabled. You would need to change the relevant setting in the settings menu for ToolkitPolls.
